name: 机体损管模块I
note:
<Counter Alignment: left>
<Counter Text Color: 18>
<Custom React Effect>
if (this.isDamage() && this.isHpEffect() && value > 0 ){
 target._easedamage = target._easedamage || 0;
 target._easedamage += Math.round(value*0.4);
 value = Math.round(value*0.6);
 user.setStateCounter(14, Math.round(user._easedamage/user.mhp * 100));
 }
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Turn Start Effect>
user._easedamage = user._easedamage || 0;
user.gainHp(Math.round(-target._easedamage/4));
user.startDamagePopup();
user._easedamage = Math.round(user._easedamage*0.75);
user.setStateCounter(14, Math.round(user._easedamage/user.mhp * 100));
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: 怪物假死
note:
<Custom Leave Effect>
 if (target._revivallevel = 1){
    target.addState(194);
    target._revivallevel = 0;
   }
 else{
  if (target._revivallevel = 2){
    target.addState(195);
    target._revivallevel = 0;
   }
  else{
    if (target._revivallevel = 3){
      target.addState(196);
      target._revivallevel = 0;
     }
    else{
      if (target._revivallevel = 4){
        target.addState(197);
        target._revivallevel = 0;
       }
      else{
       if (target._revivallevel = 5){
         target.addState(198);
         target._revivallevel = 0;
         }
        }
       }
    }
 }
</Custom Leave Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
 target._nofearcd = target._nofearcd || 0;
 if (value >= target.hp && this.isHpEffect()) {
   if (target.isStateAffected(210)) {
     }
   else{
        value = 0;
        target._waitCount = 30;
        target.startAnimation(187);
        target.removeState(209);
        target.addState(113);
        target._nofearcd = 30;
       }
  }
</Custom React Effect>

name: 无畏庇护
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
   user._nofearcd = user._nofearcd || 0;
   if (user._nofearcd <= 0){
        user._nofearcd = 0;
        user.startAnimation(186, false, 0);
        user.addState(209);
       }
   else {
    if (user._nofearcd > 0 && user._hp >0){
      user._nofearcd -= 1;
     }
    if (user._nofearcd <= 5 && user._nofearcd > 0 ){
      user.addState(212);
     }
    else{
      if (user._nofearcd <= 0){
        user._nofearcd = 0;
        user.startAnimation(186, false, 0);
        user.addState(209);
        user.removeState(212);
       }
    }
   }
</Custom Battle Effect>

   user._nofearcd = user._nofearcd || 0;

        user.startAnimation(186, false, 0);
        user.addState(209);
        user.removeState(212);
       }
   else {
    if (user._nofearcd > 0 && user._hp >0){
      user._nofearcd -= 1;
     }

    else{

</Custom Turn Start Effect>

note:

<Custom Apply Effect>
  user._defencea = user._defencea || 0; 
  user._defenceb = user._defenceb || 0;
  user._defencec = user._defencec || 0;
  if (user._defencec > 0) {
    user._defencec += 5;
    user.setStateCounter(216, user._defencec);
    user.removeState(213);
   }
  else{
   if (user._defenceb > 0) {
     user._defenceb += 5;
     user.setStateCounter(214, user._defenceb);
     user.removeState(213);
    }
   else {
     user._defencea += 5;
     user.setStateCounter(213, user._defencea);
    }
  } 
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom React Effect>
if (value > 0 && this.isHpEffect() && target._defencea > 0) { 
//判断角色是否受到伤害，且是否有免伤次数
value = 0; //令受到的伤害为 0
target._defencea -= 1; //免伤次数-1
target.setStateCounter(213, target._defencea);
if (target._defencea <= 0){ //如果免伤次数为 0
target.removeState(213); //将该状态移除
}
}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
  user._defencea = user._defencea || 0; //定义变量值
  user._defencea = 0;
</Custom Remove Effect>

name: 治疗溢出为护盾计算
note:
<Custom React Effect>
target._confirmHp = target.hp; 
//用变量存储角色受到伤害（治疗）前的生命值
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
if (value < 0 && this.isHpEffect()) { //判断角色受到治疗
if (target.hp === target.mhp) { //判断角色是否满血
var overheal = 0
if (target.isStateAffected(218)){
var overheal = (result.hpDamage + user._confirmHp - user.mhp) * 
0.2;
}
if (target.isStateAffected(219)){
var overheal = (result.hpDamage + user._confirmHp - user.mhp) * 
0.3;
}
if (target.isStateAffected(220)){
var overheal = (result.hpDamage + user._confirmHp - user.mhp) * 
0.4;
}
// 将过量治疗的部分存储在变量中
if (overheal > 0) { //如果有过量的治疗
target.gainBarrier(overheal); //转化为护盾值
}
}
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: 命中提升1
note:
<SF_StatesCustomAddtion_Before>
var result = {
  "result": false,
  "statesAdd": [],
  "statesRemove": [],
  "statesRefresh": [],
};
if (this.isStateAffected(223)) {
  result.statesRemove.push(223);
  result.statesAdd.push(224);
}
else {
if (this.isStateAffected(224)) {
  result.statesRemove.push(224);
  result.statesAdd.push(225);
}
else {
if (this.isStateAffected(225)) {
  result.statesRemove.push(225);
  result.statesAdd.push(226);
}
else {
if (this.isStateAffected(226)) {
  result.statesAdd.push(226);
} 
  result.statesAdd.push(223);
}
}
}
return result;
</SF_StatesCustomAddtion_Before>

name: 通用吸血计算
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
  user._bsrate = user._bsrate || 0;
  user._absrate = user._absrate || 0;
  user._pbsate = user._pbsrate || 0;
  user._mbsrate = user._mbsrate || 0;
  user._bsaffective = user._bsaffective || 1;
  if (this.isSkill && value >0 && user._bsaffective > 0){
   user._bsrate += user._absrate;
   if (this.isPhysical()){
    user._bsrate += user._pbsrate;
   }
   else{
   if (this.isMagical()){
    user._bsrate += user._mbsrate;
   }
   }
   user._bsrate *= user._bsaffective;
   if (user._bsrate > 1){
    user._bsrate = 1
   }
   var hpgain = value;
   hpgain *= user._bsrate;
   user.gainHp(Math.floor(hpgain));
  } 
</Custom Establish Effect>

name: 伤害加深100
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
   user._damagechange = user._damagechange || 0;
   user._damagechange += 100;
   if (user._damagechange == 0){
     user.setStateCounter(237, 0);
     user.setStateCounter(238, 0);
     user.removeState(237);
     user.removeState(238);
   }
     else if (user._damagechange > 0){
       user.removeState(238);
       user.addState(237);
       if (user._damagechange > 999){
         user._damagechange = 999;
       }
       user.setStateCounter(237, user._damagechange);
    }
       else if (user._damagechange < 0){
         user.removeState(238);
         user.addState(238);
         if (user._damagechange < -999){
           user._damagechange = -999;
         }
         user.setStateCounter(238, -user._damagechange);
       }
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Leave Effect>
   user._damagechange = user._damagechange || 0;
   user._damagechange -= 100;
   if (user._damagechange = 0){
     user.setStateCounter(237, 0);
     user.setStateCounter(238, 0);
     user.removeState(237);
     user.removeState(238);
   }
     else if (user._damagechange > 0){
       user.removeState(238);
       user.addState(237);
       if (user._damagechange > 999){
         user._damagechange = 999;
       }
       user.setStateCounter(237, user._damagechange);
    }
       else if (user._damagechange < 0){
         user.removeState(238);
         user.addState(238);
         if (user._damagechange < -999){
           user._damagechange = -999;
         }

       }
</Custom Leave Effect>
